about_the_game:
Includes the Copoka Original Soundtrack with music by Pablo Sorribes Bernhard, David Sjökvist & Joakim Stenmark in MP3 and FLAC format, with bonus tracks not heard in the game and notations sheets for two of the songs.

Songs and notation sheets will be placed in your Copoka folder in the Steam Directory:
...Steam\steamapps\common\Copoka\Soundtrack
